item.title: Data Communications Management
item.description: DCM: Dunder Canada Mifflin? Data Communications Management is a 60 years old commercial printing services company, with added marketing and brand management solutions. Their core business is facing obvious secular challenges and is slowly declining. The company caters to big enterprise clients in multiple industries: banking, retail, healthcare, energy, cannabis, etc. According to the 2020 MD&A, the company provides services and products to 70 of the 100 largest corporations and government entities in Canada.
